field.name: TPCP
field.description: TXPC array (outbound posted requests FIFO) parity error. When set, indicates that a parity error was detected on the array's read port.

field.name: TNPP
field.description: TXNP array (outbound non-posted requests FIFO) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: TFTP
field.description: TXFT array (output non-posted requests free tags FIFO) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: TCAP
field.description: TXCA array (transmit completions attributes array) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: TCIP
field.description: TXCIF array (transmit completions idications array) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: RCAP
field.description: RXCA array (receive completions attributes array) parity error. When set, indicates that the parity error was detected on array's read port.

field.name: PLUP
field.description: PCI Express LinkUp status. When set, indicates that the PCI Express Link moved into the LinkUp state.

field.name: PLDN
field.description: PCI Express LinkDown status. When set, indicates that the PCI Express Link moved into the LinkDown state.

field.name: OTDD
field.description: Outbound request discard status. When set, indicates that the outbound request TLP was discarded.
